text: I'm having some troubles with libcurl, I think we should build it with `--enable-versioned-symbols`: <https://stackoverflow.com/a/56805774/2442087> this is what Linux distributions do (Debian: <https://salsa.debian.org/debian/curl/-/blob/4c763143767e46cb91069e496ff385810336e520/debian/rules#L16>; Archlinux: <https://github.com/archlinux/svntogit-packages/blob/e82f7544465e00a03a243345a9ebf0b4e686ab86/trunk/PKGBUILD#L32>).  CC: <@U66GD0880>
